#summary Using HeeksCNC 0.4

= An example =
Make sure the "Program" and "Output" windows are visible ( switch them on from the "View" menu ).
Open the file that comes with HeeksCNC 0.2.0, "sample program.heeks"


You can see that there is some text in the program window.

Press the "Run the program" icon at the bottom left of the Program window.
You should see some profiling tool path.

Press the "Post process" button at the bottom right of the Program window.
You will see some NC code for my Sieg KX1 milling machine appear in the Output window.

To make NC code for your machine, edit siegkx1.py.
If it's not obvious ask me about it.   danheeks@gmail.com
